name: nove-backend
description: AI-Powered Project Management Platform - Microservices Backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:project" "npm run dev:task" "npm run dev:company" "npm run dev:leads" "npm run dev:analytics"
scripts.dev:auth: cd microservices/auth-service && AUTH_SERVICE_PORT=3001 DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=../../.env node -r dotenv/config working-auth-server.js
scripts.dev:user: cd microservices/user-service && USER_SERVICE_PORT=3002 DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=../../.env node -r dotenv/config working-user-server.js
scripts.dev:project: cd microservices/project-service && PROJECT_SERVICE_PORT=3003 DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=../../.env node -r dotenv/config working-project-server.js
scripts.dev:task: cd microservices/task-service && TASK_SERVICE_PORT=3004 DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=../../.env node -r dotenv/config working-task-server.js
scripts.dev:company: cd microservices/company-information-service && COMPANY_SERVICE_PORT=3005 DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=../../.env node -r dotenv/config enhanced-company-server.js
scripts.dev:leads: cd microservices/leads-service && LEADS_SERVICE_PORT=3006 DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=../../.env node -r dotenv/config simple-server.js
scripts.dev:analytics: cd microservices/analytics-service && ANALYTICS_SERVICE_PORT=3007 DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=../../.env node -r dotenv/config simple-server.js

author: Sakshi Jadhav
